response.original_title: Old Skool Killaz: Sword of the Master
response.overview: In director Won-shik Lim's rousing martial arts adventure, sightless orphan Elaine (Mi-ja Sa) embarks on an impassioned journey when she learns that her mother -- who abandoned Elaine years earlier -- may still be alive. On her quest, Elaine, who is a skilled swordswoman, unexpectedly finds herself pitted against a cathouse madam and a brutal crime lord. The film's supporting cast includes Chen Sau Kei and Li Tai Shing.
response.title: Old Skool Killaz: Sword of the Master
